#summary This Page Mainly Talks About The SDKs & Tools Required For This Project.

= Introduction =

The SDKs & TOOLs listed below are what this project MAY need. They can be acquired by the "Downloads" section of this project:
 
http://code.google.com/p/academic-crawler/downloads/list.


 *`NOTICE` 1:* Some of those downloadable items are binaries which can be put into immediate use after installation, while the others are source codes which may need a compilation first, see other documents to find more details on *HOW TO* compile software from source codes.

 *`NOTICE` 2:* In the meantime, some downloadable items are opensource projects. Those items can be used freely *UNDER CERTAIN LICENSES*, while the others are commercial products which can only be used *AFTER PURCHASE*.


= Details =

== SDKs ==

=== [http://code.google.com/p/academic-crawler/downloads/list 1. SDK_01-Qt_4.6.2_src] ===

 Qt( Open Source Edition ) is used in this project to build application GUIs.

 This document is a package with source codes of Qt 4.6.2.

 *`BEFORE`* using this version of Qt SDK you need to *BUILD BINARIES FROM THE SOURCE CODES*.

 To know *HOW TO* build Qt 4.6.2 binaries from src and configure it for use in *win32 msvc 2005*, please check out instructions on project wiki.

 If you are unwilling to build Qt 4.6.2 from src, turn to "SDK_02-Qt_4.6.2_bin" - Qt 4.6.2 binaries built for *win32 msvc 2005*.

=== [http://code.google.com/p/academic-crawler/downloads/list 2. SDK_02-Qt_4.6.2_bin] ===
